士官候補生: (しかんこうほせい) - military cadet; officer cadet
士師: (しし) - judge (of ancient China); judge (leader of ancient Israel)
士庶: (ししょ) - samurai and commoners; normal people (as opposed to people of a high social standing)
士族: (しぞく) - family or person with samurai ancestors
士族の商法: (しぞくのしょうほう) - amateurish and haughty way of doing business; venturing into an unfamiliar line of business (and often failing)
士気: (しき) - morale (of troops, team, etc.); esprit de corps
士気旺盛: (しきおうせい) - (yoji) morale being very high; heightened fighting spirit
士気阻喪: (しきそそう) - (yoji) demoralization; collapse of morale; one's morale being shaken
士気高揚: (しきこうよう) - (yoji) raise (lift) morale; have an inspiring effect on morale
士農工商: (しのうこうしょう) - (yoji) hierarchy of samurai, farmers, artisans, and merchants in Edo society
士魂: (しこん) - manly spirit; soul of a samurai
士魂商才: (しこんしょうさい) - (yoji) having a samurai's spirit and a merchant's business sense
壬: (にん) - 9º signo do calendário, 9º em classificação, nono signo do calendário chinês
壬午: (じんご) - nineteenth of the sexagenary cycle
壬寅: (じんいん) - thirty-ninth of the sexagenary cycle
壬戌: (じんじゅつ) - 59th of the sexagenary cycle
壬生菜: (ミブナ) - Brassica campestris var. laciniifolia (variety of wild mustard)
壬申: (じんしん) - ninth of the sexagenary cycle
壬辰: (じんしん) - twenty-ninth of the sexagenary cycle
壮: (sou) - robust , vibrancy, strength, bravery, manliness; (especialmente de homens) one's prime (approx. age 30)
壮とする: (そうとする) - to admire (approve of) a person's courage
壮丁: (そうてい) - youth; young man who has reached adulthood (conscription age)
壮士: (そうし) - young man in his prime; swaggerer; ruffian
壮大華麗: (そうだいかれい) - (yoji) grandiose and splendid
壮年期: (そうねんき) - prime of one's life; {geol} stage of maturity
壮挙: (そうきょ) - ambitious (heroic) undertaking; daring enterprise; grand scheme
壮族: (チワンぞく) - Zhuang (Chinese ethnic minority group); Chuang
壮者: (そうしゃ) - person in his or her prime; man in his prime; woman in her prime
壮者を凌ぐ: (そうしゃをしのぐ) - to put young men to shame
壮行会: (そうこうかい) - farewell party/send-off party; motivational rally
壮言大語: (そうげんたいご) - (yoji)  heroic words; big talk; boasting; bragging; grandiloquence; rodomontade
壮麗: (そうれい) - splendour; splendor; pompousness; magnificence
壮齢: (そうれい) - in the prime of manhood
声: (sei/koe) - voice , voice; singing (of a bird), chirping (of an insect), hoot; voice, opinion (as expressed in words), view, wish, attitude, will; sound
声かけ: (こえかけ) - saying something (to someone); greeting; approaching (someone)
声かけ運動: (こえかけうんどう) - friendly-greeting campaign; campaign for people to exchange greetings
声がかすれる: (こえがかすれる) - to become hoarse
声がかり: (こえがかり) - recommendation of an influential person
声がかれる: (こえがかれる) - to become hoarse
声が嗄れる: (こえがかれる) - to become hoarse
声が掠れる: (こえがかすれる) - to become hoarse
声が枯れる: (こえがかれる) - to become hoarse
声の仏法僧: (こえのぶっぽうそう) - Eurasian scops owl (Otus scops)
声はすれども姿は見えず: (こえはすれどもすがたはみえず) - It's audible but invisible
声をかける: (こえをかける) - to greet; to call out to someone
声を上げる: (こえをあげる) - to raise one's voice
声を出す: (こえをだす) - to speak; to say; to vocalize
声を励ます: (こえをはげます) - to raise one's voice
声を呑む: (こえをのむ) - to gulp in astonishment; to be taken aback speechless
声を大にしていう: (こえをだいにしていう) - to say it out loud; to yell out; to emphasize
声を大にして言う: (こえをだいにしていう) - to say it out loud; to yell out; to emphasize
声を大にする: (こえをだいにする) - to emphasize; to state emphatically; to speak loudly about; to raise one's voice; to lift one's voice
声を尖らす: (こえをとがらす) - to speak sharply; to sharpen one's tone; to raise one's voice
声を張り上げる: (こえをはりあげる) - to raise one's voice; to shout
声を忍ばせて: (こえをしのばせて) - in a subdued voice
声を掛ける: (こえをかける) - to greet; to call out to someone
声を殺す: (こえをころす) - to muffle one's voice; to speak (or sob, etc.) quietly
声を立てる: (こえをたてる) - to let out a cry; to shout
声を詰まらせて: (こえをつまらせて) - in a choked voice
声を限りに: (こえをかぎりに) - at the top of one's voice
声優: (せいゆう) - voice actor or actress (radio, animation, etc.)
声掛かり: (こえがかり) - recommendation of an influential person
声掛け: (こえかけ) - saying something (to someone); greeting; approaching (someone)
声掛け運動: (こえかけうんどう) - friendly-greeting campaign; campaign for people to exchange greetings
声掛り: (こえがかり) - recommendation of an influential person
声楽曲: (せいがくきょく) - vocal music piece
